scripts.service_create: ibmcloud service create cloudantNoSQLDB Lite cloudant-ippei && ibmcloud service create rediscloud 30mb redis-30mb-ippei
scripts.service_delete: ibmcloud service delete cloudant-ippei -f && ibmcloud service delete redis-30mb-ippei -f
scripts.vcap_services: ibmcloud app env cloudant-redis-performance-test-ippei | node node_modules/cfenv-one-liner -p VCAP_SERVICES
